== Kadikkad (CT) (627792) ==

Kadikkad (CT) is a town in the [[Chavakkad]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 9.03 sq. km. and harbouring 3814 households with total population of 19147 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 31 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 331 km. Male population is 8734 and female population is 10413. Scheduled Caste population is 1303 and Scheduled Tribes population is 28. Census Location Code of the town is 627792<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 31 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 110 km. Railway station is at Guruvayoor at a distance of 15 km.
